duties_responsibilities.duty: Promote, present, and sell company products and services to potential customers.
Identify and qualify leads, build relationships, and close sales to achieve revenue targets.
Communicate product features, benefits, and pricing to clearly articulate value to customers.
Maintain accurate records of sales activities, customer interactions, and transactions.
Collaborate with the sales team to develop and implement effective sales strategies and tactics.
Stay updated on industry trends, market conditions, and competitor activities to identify new opportunities.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Bachelor's preferred)
